head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COHN, ROSE Y.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COHN, ROSE Y.

block.p: COHN-Rose Y. Of Paterson, NJ, on Friday, May 26, 2000. Beloved wife of the late David Cohn. Devoted mother of Betty Ann Weintraub and Albert L. Cohn. Sister of Ida Abramowitz and Frances Sanders. Cherished grandmother of Jeffrey Weintraub, Andrew Weintraub and Lisa Bridges, Melissa Paprin, Joshua Cohn, Priscilla Karnovsky, Liza-Faith Wallach and Thaddeus Cohn. Great-grandmother of Rachel, Alex, Caleb, Noah, Eliza, Julian, Bernadette, and Sarah, Samantha, Sydney, Nicholas, Benjamin, Augustus and Rebecca. Services 11:30 AM, Sunday, at Louis Suburban Chapel, 1301 Broadway (Route 4 West), Fair Lawn, New Jersey.
